__e: Guns and badges only, doc. Yes, of course.
Armed police, stay where you are!
I am armed and ready to ride.
I want them armed and ready to march within two weeks!
- Keep our boys armed and ready, and the Germans will think twice about trying to get the drop on us.
Don't make it armed robbery - that's not how they knew me.
We have enough to put you down for armed robbery times three.
Yeah. Told everyone I was in for armed robbery to keep a target off my back.
I think we can all agree it helps none of us to have those idiots armed to the teeth.
And unless you seriously strapped you about to not really be okay too.
I think we can all agree it helps none of us to have those idiots armed to the teeth.
If they will not hear his word, let them come armed for war.
And unless you seriously strapped you about to not really be okay too.
Make sure he's not armed with explosives.
Armed with the secrets of your world, I will be not only friend but a weapon.
We'll do whatever we can to avoid them, but we have no idea what these inmates might be armed with and I will not send my men in there unarmed.
